      • getServiceComponentHostMap

        Map<String,Set<String>> getServiceComponentHostMap(Set<String> hostNames,
                                                   Set<String> serviceNames)
        Gets a map of components to hosts they are installed on.

        This may may be filtered by host and/or service by optionally providing a set of hostname and/or service names to use as a filter. null for either filter indicates no filter (or all), an empty set indicates a complete filter (or none).

        Parameters:
        hostNames -
        serviceNames -
        Returns:
        a map of (filtered) components to hosts

      • getServiceComponentHosts

                                                    String componentName)
        Get all ServiceComponentHosts for a given service and optional component If the component name is null, all components for the requested service will be returned.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name a the desired service
        componentName - the name a the desired component - null indicates all components for the service
        Returns:
        a list of found ServiceComponentHost instances

      • transitionHostsToInstalling

        List<Host> transitionHostsToInstalling(RepositoryVersionEntity repoVersionEntity,
                                       VersionDefinitionXml versionDefinitionXml,
                                       boolean forceInstalled)
                                throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Creates or updates host versions for all of the hosts within a cluster based on state of cluster stack version. This is used to transition all hosts into the correct state (which may not be RepositoryVersionState.INSTALLING).

        Hosts that are in maintenance mode will be transitioned directly into RepositoryVersionState.OUT_OF_SYNC instead. Hosts which do not need the version distributed to them will move into the RepositoryVersionState.NOT_REQUIRED state.

        Parameters:
        repoVersionEntity - the repository that the hosts are being transitioned for (not null).
        versionDefinitionXml - the VDF, or null if none.
        forceInstalled - if true, then this will transition everything directly to RepositoryVersionState.INSTALLED instead of RepositoryVersionState.INSTALLING. Hosts which should received other states (like RepositoryVersionState.NOT_REQUIRED will continue to receive those states.
        Returns:
        a list of hosts which need the repository installed.
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • getProvisioningState

        State getProvisioningState()
        Gets whether the cluster is still initializing or has finished with its deployment requests.
        Returns:
        either State.INIT or State.INSTALLED, never null.

      • addDesiredConfig

        ServiceConfigVersionResponse addDesiredConfig(String user,
                                              Set<Config> configs)
                                       throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Adds and sets a DESIRED configuration to be applied to a cluster. There can be only one selected config per type.
        Parameters:
        user - the user making the change for audit purposes
        configs - the set of Config objects to set as desired
        Returns:
        true if the config was added, or false if the config is already set as the current
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • addDesiredConfig

        ServiceConfigVersionResponse addDesiredConfig(String user,
                                              Set<Config> configs,
                                              String serviceConfigVersionNote)
                                       throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Adds and sets a DESIRED configuration to be applied to a cluster. There can be only one selected config per type.
        Parameters:
        user - the user making the change for audit purposes
        configs - the set of Config objects to set as desired
        serviceConfigVersionNote - note to attach to service config version if created
        Returns:
        true if the config was added, or false if the config is already set as the current
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • checkPermission

        boolean checkPermission(PrivilegeEntity privilegeEntity,
                        boolean readOnly)
        Determine whether or not access to this cluster resource should be allowed based on the given privilege.
        Parameters:
        privilegeEntity - the privilege
        readOnly - indicate whether or not this check is for a read only operation
        Returns:
        true if the access to this cluster is allowed

      • addSessionAttributes

        void addSessionAttributes(Map<String,Object> attributes)
        Add the given map of attributes to the session for this cluster.
        Parameters:
        attributes - the session attributes

      • setSessionAttribute

        void setSessionAttribute(String key,
                         Object value)
        Sets or adds an attribute in the session for this cluster
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the key which identifies the attribute in the map
        value - the value to set

      • removeSessionAttribute

        void removeSessionAttribute(String key)
        Removes an attribute from the session for this cluster
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the key which identifies the attribute in the map

      • getSessionAttributes

        Map<String,Object> getSessionAttributes()
        Get the map of session attributes for this cluster.
        Returns:
        the map of session attributes for this cluster; never null

      • applyLatestConfigurations

        void applyLatestConfigurations(StackId stackId,
                               String serviceName)
        Makes the most recent configurations for the specified stack current. This will only modify configurations for the given service.

        When completed, all other configurations for any other stack will remain, but will not be marked as selected.

        Parameters:
        stackId - the stack to use when finding the latest configurations (not null).
        serviceName - the service to modify configurations for (not null).

      • removeConfigurations

        void removeConfigurations(StackId stackId,
                          String serviceName)
        Removes all configurations for the specified service and stack.
        Parameters:
        stackId - the stack to use when finding the configurations to remove (not null).
        serviceName - the service to rmeove configurations for (not null).

      • isBluePrintDeployed

        boolean isBluePrintDeployed()
        Returns whether this cluster was provisioned by a Blueprint or not.
        Returns:
        true if the cluster was deployed with a Blueprint otherwise false.

      • getUpgradeInProgress

        UpgradeEntity getUpgradeInProgress()
        Gets an UpgradeEntity if there is an upgrade in progress or an upgrade that has been suspended. This will return the associated UpgradeEntity if it exists.
        Returns:
        an upgrade which will either be in progress or suspended, or null if none.

      • setUpgradeEntity

        void setUpgradeEntity(UpgradeEntity upgradeEntity)
               throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Sets or clears the associated upgrade with the cluster.
        Parameters:
        upgradeEntity - the upgrade entity to set for cluster, or null for none.
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • isUpgradeSuspended

        boolean isUpgradeSuspended()
        Gets whether there is an upgrade which has been suspended and not yet finalized.
        Returns:
        true if the last upgrade is suspended

      • getServiceByConfigType

        String getServiceByConfigType(String configType)
        Returns the name of the service that the passed config type belongs to.
        Parameters:
        configType - the config type to look up the service by
        Returns:
        returns the name of the service that the config type belongs to if there is any otherwise returns null.

      • getClusterProperty

        String getClusterProperty(String propertyName,
                          String defaultValue)
        Gets the most recent value of cluster-env/propertyName where propertyName is the paramter specified to the method. This will use the desired configuration for cluster-env.

        The value is cached on this Cluster instance, so subsequent calls will not inclur a lookup penalty. This class also responds to ClusterConfigChangedEvent in order to clear the cache.

        Parameters:
        propertyName - the property to lookup in cluster-env (not null).
        defaultValue - a default value to cache return if none exists (may be null).
        Returns:

      • getClusterSize

        int getClusterSize()
        Returns the number of hosts that form the cluster.
        Returns:
        number of hosts that form the cluster

      • getRoleCommandOrder

        RoleCommandOrder getRoleCommandOrder()
        Gets a new instance of a RoleCommandOrder for this cluster.
        Returns:
        the role command order instance (not null).

      • addSuspendedUpgradeParameters

        void addSuspendedUpgradeParameters(Map<String,String> commandParams,
                                   Map<String,String> roleParams)
        Adds upgrade specific command and role parameters to the command maps if there is a suspended upgrade. If there is not a suspended upgrade, then the maps are not modified.

        Parameters:
        commandParams - the command parameter map to supplement (not null).
        roleParams - the role parameter map to supplement (not null).

      • getComponentVersionMap

        Map<String,Map<String,String>> getComponentVersionMap()
        Gets a mapping of service to component/version for every installed component in the cluster which advertises a version and for which the repository has been resolved.
        Returns:
        a mapping of service to component version, or an empty map.

      • buildClusterInformation

        org.apache.ambari.spi.ClusterInformation buildClusterInformation()
        Builds a ClusterInformation instance from a Cluster.
        Returns:
        the ClusterInformation instance comprised of simple POJOs and SPI classes.
